caption: Relating to the control of disease in wildlife; creating criminal offenses; authorizing an administrative penalty.
summary: This bill amends the Parks and Wildlife Code to establish regulations for wildlife disease control. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, it gives broad authority to regulate wildlife movement from any country into Texas, requiring health certificates and permits. Any person moving wildlife in violation of quarantine rules faces criminal penalties. The bill focuses on protecting wildlife from diseases rather than restricting human immigration.
translation: 该法案修订了公园和野生动物法规，建立了野生动物疾病控制的规定。虽然没有特别针对中国移民，但它赋予了管理部门广泛的权力来规范从任何国家向德克萨斯州运送野生动物的行为，要求提供健康证明和许可证。任何违反隔离规定运送野生动物的人都将面临刑事处罚。该法案的重点是保护野生动物免受疾病侵害，而不是限制人类移民。
committees:
